event.delete.confirm: I understand that the deletion of the event cannot be reversed.
event.delete.description: If the event is deleted, all associated data will be irrevocably deleted. Participants will be notified. Any output within Discord will not be deleted and cannot be archived afterwards.
event.details.action.slot.banned: You have been excluded from this slot
event.details.action.slot.requirementsNo: You don't meet all necessary requirements
Only community administrators can mark this requirement as met by you
event.details.action.slot.reserved: This slot is reserved for a group you do not belong to
event.details.creator: Event from
event.details.default.description: The default details configured here can be used as placeholders when creating and editing events, making it easier to handle events of type {0}.
event.details.default.selection.descript: Press Enter to submit a suggestion
event.details.default.title: Title
event.details.hiddenEventWarning: This event isn't yet visible in the participant's calendar. If slotting should start, start it in the edit mode.
event.details.requirementList.descriptio: The requirements selected here are available when creating and editing events. They can be applied to entire events, squads or slots.
event.details.title: Title
event.eventType.error: Event types couldn't be loaded. Please check your internet connection and login status. You can continue working, but may not be able to save. Reloading the site should fix the problem.
event.eventType.name: Event type name
event.hidden.tooltip: Allows everyone interested to see the event in the calendar.
event.name: Title
event.requirements.description: Depending on the configuration, the requirements are a hint or a restriction for participation.
event.requirements.error: Couldn't load the available requirements. Please check your internet connection and login status. You can continue without requirements, but may not be able to save. Navigating to the previous step and back to the slot list will attempt to reload.
event.save.loading.partOne: The event is currently being saved. You will automatically be redirected once finished. If an error occurs you can get back to the calendar
event.shareable.noLongerPossible: Has already been added to another community.
event.shareable.tooltip: Allows other groups to add this event ot their calendar and add participants through it.
featurePreview.disabledDuringPreview: This function is not available during the preview.
footer.author: 2025 Alf. All rights reserved.
guild.bans.none: No bans have been issued yet.
guild.config.archive.description: Archive channel where the events will be listed after completion.
guild.config.archive.error: The selected channel is no longer available. Please select a new channel.
guild.config.archive.label: Archive Channel
guild.config.archive.loadingError: The channel list could not be loaded. Please check your internet connection. Reloading the page should fix the problem.
guild.config.language.description: Determines the language used for output outside the website. E.g. event details in Discord.
guild.config.role.error: The selected role is no longer available. Please select a new role.
guild.config.role.loadingError: The roles could not be loaded. Please check your internet connection. Reloading the page should fix the problem.
guild.config.role.noPermission: The bot does not have permission to manage roles. Without this permission, the bot will not be able to update roles in Discord.
guild.config.roles.description: Configure the synchronisation of member roles with Discord roles. This means that adding or removing a configured Discord role will update the permissions in the member list. The same applies vice versa: adjusting the roles in the member list will also update the Discord roles. If no role is configured for members, they remain part of the community even if other roles are removed. Otherwise, they are removed.
guild.config.roles.sync.description: Imports the current status of roles in Discord. Especially useful if roles have been newly added or changed here.
guild.config.roles.sync.submitted: Synchronisation has started. Depending on the size of the community, this process may take a moment.
guild.requirementList.delete.description: Deleting the list of requirements irrevocably deletes all associated data. The requirements are removed from all events in which they were used. The assignments to members are also deleted.
guild.requirementList.description: Requirements restrict the group of participants or indicate that a certain condition must be met. Requirements are enabled for event types and can then be applied by the event creator to entire events, squads or slots. For each requirement, you can decide whether attendees can register without meeting the requirement, and whether attendees can choose to meet the requirement independently.
guild.requirementList.enforced.tooltip: Participants must fulfill the requirements to be able to register for the slot.
guild.requirementList.global: This list is available to everyone and is automatically kept up to date.
guild.requirementList.memberAssignable.t: Allows participants to decide for themselves whether or not they meet the requirements for taking part.
guild.requirementList.name: List name
guild.user.ban.description:
A banned account will be removed from the community and all registrations for future events will be cancelled. Previous registrations will be retained, but new registrations for events of this community will not be possible.
The individual will not be notified of the ban or the reason for the ban.
guild.user.ban.title: Would you like to ban {0}?
guild.user.manageRequirements.descriptio: This is where you manage the requirements for attending events. The settings for the requirements listed here can only be changed by administrators.
guild.user.manageRequirements.title: Requirements fulfilled by {0}
guilds.inactive.description: Communities are considered inactive if they have not created their own event yet, or if their last event was more than six months ago.
home.blog.empty: No post has landed here yet.

profile.externalCalendar.tooltip: Activate external calendar integration here to be able to add events e.g. on your phone.
profile.externalCalendar.tutorial.partOn: Tutorial on how to include this file in

slotlistEntry.settings.reservation.descr: Only members of the selected group can register here.
